biotools.summary: Simple statistical identification of contaminating sequence features in marker-gene or metagenomics data. Works on any kind of feature derived from environmental sequencing data. Requires DNA quantitation data or sequenced negative control samples.

bioschemas.name: decontam
bioschemas.summary: Simple statistical identification of contaminating sequence features in marker-gene or metagenomics data. Works on any kind of feature derived from environmental sequencing data. Requires DNA quantitation data or sequenced negative control samples.

galaxy.summary: Removes decontamination features (ASVs/OTUs) using control samples
galaxy.bio_tools_summary: Simple statistical identification of contaminating sequence features in marker-gene or metagenomics data. Works on any kind of feature derived from environmental sequencing data. Requires DNA quantitation data or sequenced negative control samples.
